Sentencas: This paper presents implementation of a model predictive controller (MPC) for an experimental solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system.
Titulo: Experimental validation of model predictive control for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The MPC controller is based on a gain-scheduled predictor with block-oriented structure that can capture important non-linear effects while still keeping the computational complexity low enough to meet real time control requirements.
Titulo: Experimental validation of model predictive control for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Experimental results show the MPC is able to regulate the SOFC cathode outlet temperature in the face of startup transients and input perturbations.
Titulo: Experimental validation of model predictive control for solid oxide fuel cells
